User Story: As a trader, I want to submit limit orders so that I can specify the price at which I want to buy or sell an asset
As a trader, I want to submit market orders so that I can execute trades at the current market price
As a trader, I want to receive order acknowledgments so that I can confirm that my order was received by the system
As a trader, I want to receive execution reports so that I can track the status of my orders
As a trader, I want to cancel orders so that I can manage my trading positions effectively
As a trader, I want to modify orders so that I can adjust my trading strategy as needed
As a trader, I want to have access to real-time market data so that I can make informed trading decisions
As an admin, I want to add and remove instruments via the Admin API so that I can manage the available trading options
As an admin, I want to configure system parameters so that I can customize the platform to meet specific requirements
As an admin, I want to have role-based access control so that I can control user permissions effectively
As a market operator, I want to control the market state (Open/Halted/Closed) so that I can manage trading sessions
As a market operator, I want to have emergency halt capability so that I can respond to critical situations quickly
As a developer, I want to implement protocol adapters for FIX, REST, WebSocket, and gRPC so that the system can communicate with external platforms
As a user, I want to have a clear onboarding process with certification workflows so that I can easily start using the platform
